name: Mara Moray And Machu Picchu
description: This tour is a full day visit to the impressive Sacred Valley of the Incas, covering the visits, Moray archaeological site, salt mines and Ollantaytambo archaeological site, with unforgettable train journey, along the way we will appreciate breathtaking scenery surrounded mountains and local villages. Ending our trip at the majestic citadel of MachuPicchu.
